data.title: Benazir Bhutto Killed – DW – 12
data.meta_description: Pakistani opposition leader Benazir Bhutto has died in hospital after being shot in the head at a party rally in the city of Rawalpindi. At least twenty other people died when the rally was attacked by gunfire and at least one bomb. The United States have condemned the attack, as has Russia.
data.text:
Rehman Malik, an official from Bhutto's Pakistan People's Party said "she has been martyred" after the 54-year-old former prime minister died in hospital.

According to police, a suicide bomber shot at her and she was wounded by a gunshot in her head, as she left a rally in a park. He then blew himself up. At least 20 other people were killed by the blast.

Initially, officials had said Bhutto was safe but it later emerged she had been wounded and rushed to hospital where she later was confirmed dead.
